at.falb.games.alcatraz.api

Interface MoveListener


  • public interface MoveListener
    This interface defines methods for the events which can be sent from the game board.
    Author:
    falbj, Froihofer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void gameWon(Player player)
      Informs you when the game is finished and who wins it.
      void moveDone(Player player, Prisoner prisoner, int rowOrCol, int row, int col)
      Informs about a move done by the user via the GUI.

    • Method Detail

      • moveDone

        void moveDone(Player player,
              Prisoner prisoner,
              int rowOrCol,
              int row,
              int col)
        Informs about a move done by the user via the GUI.
        Parameters:
        player - The player which is moving a prisoner. This has to be the current player (otherwise nothing is done).
        prisoner - The prisoner to move.
        rowOrCol - Can be either Game.ROW or Game.COL, see Game
        row - The row to move to.
        col - The column to move to.

      • gameWon

        void gameWon(Player player)
        Informs you when the game is finished and who wins it.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who wins the game.
